<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_macro"><sys_ui_macro action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><category>general</category><description>Custom checkbox used by Table variable. </description><media_type/><name>cs_custom_ui_checkbox</name><sys_created_by>valor.poland@cs_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-01-01 03:21:44</sys_created_on><sys_id>c5fc3cf83146d10053e0a5578f24cf94</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>alf_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2014-03-24 21:37:53</sys_updated_on><xml><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <j:jelly trim="true" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide"> <g:macro name="REQUIRED" readonly="false" />
<j:if test="${jvar_readonly == 'false'}"> <j:if test="${jvar_value == 'true'}"> <input type="checkbox" id="ni.${jvar_name}" name="ni.${jvar_name}" checked="checked" value="true" class="${jvar_class}" onClick="setCheckBox(this);${jvar_onchange};" /> </j:if>
<j:if test="${jvar_value != 'true'}"> <input type="checkbox" id="ni.${jvar_name}" name="ni.${jvar_name}" value="false" class="${jvar_class}" onClick="setCheckBox(this);${jvar_onchange};" /> </j:if> </j:if> <j:if test="${jvar_readonly == 'true'}"> <j:if test="${jvar_value == 'true'}"> <input type="checkbox" id="ni.${jvar_name}" name="ni.${jvar_name}" checked="checked" value="true" class="${jvar_class}" onClick="setCheckBox(this);${jvar_onchange};" readonly="readonly" disabled="true"/> </j:if>
<j:if test="${jvar_value != 'true'}"> <input type="checkbox" id="ni.${jvar_name}" name="ni.${jvar_name}" value="false" class="${jvar_class}" onClick="setCheckBox(this);${jvar_onchange};" readonly="readonly" disabled="true" /> </j:if> </j:if>
<input type="hidden" id="${jvar_name}" name="${jvar_name}" value="${jvar_value}" class="${jvar_class}" /> </j:jelly>]]></xml></sys_ui_macro><sys_app_file action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_app/><sys_code>!!1N./</sys_code><sys_created_by>valor.poland@cs_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-01-01 03:21:44</sys_created_on><sys_id>7c69469f7defd10066b727b89dcacbf8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>cs_custom_ui_checkbox</sys_name><sys_parent/><sys_path>!!1N./</sys_path><sys_policy/><sys_source_deleted>false</sys_source_deleted><sys_source_id>c5fc3cf83146d10053e0a5578f24cf94</sys_source_id><sys_source_table>sys_ui_macro</sys_source_table><sys_type>code</sys_type><sys_update_name>sys_ui_macro_c5fc3cf83146d10053e0a5578f24cf94</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>alf_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2014-03-24 21:37:53</sys_updated_on></sys_app_file></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_macro_e74f8fda0fffb500d7ebc09ce1050e29
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_macro"><sys_ui_macro action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><category>general</category><description>Creates a text input field

Attributes: 
type=the type for the input field, defaults to text
name= name of the input field
label=the label of the field
value= initial value of the field
onkeyup=the javascript to call onkeyup
onchange=the javascript to call onchange
onclick_label=the javascript to call onclick of the label
mandatory=whether or not this field is madatory, defaults to false
size=the size of the field
style=the style of the input field
readonly=make the input field readonly, defaults to false
</description><media_type/><name>cs_ui_text_field</name><scoped_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_macro</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-05-05 22:05:35</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>e74f8fda0fffb500d7ebc09ce1050e29</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>cs_ui_text_field</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_macro_e74f8fda0fffb500d7ebc09ce1050e29</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-05-05 22:05:35</sys_updated_on><xml><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="true" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null">
   <g:macro type="text" name="REQUIRED" value="" onkeyup="" onchange="onChange('${jvar_name}');" mandatory="false" size="" style="" readonly="false" maxlength=""/>
   <j:if test="${jvar_readonly == 'false'}">
     <input type="${jvar_type}" name="${jvar_name}" id="${jvar_name}" value="${jvar_value}" onkeyup="${jvar_onkeyup}" onchange="${jvar_onchange}" size="${jvar_size}" style="${jvar_style}" maxlength="${jvar_maxlength}"/>
   </j:if>
   <j:if test="${jvar_readonly == 'true'}">
     <input type="${jvar_type}" readonly="readonly" name="${jvar_name}" id="${jvar_name}" value="${jvar_value}" onkeyup="${jvar_onkeyup}" onchange="${jvar_onchange}" size="${jvar_size}" style="border:0px;background:transparent" maxlength="${jvar_maxlength}"/>
   </j:if>
</j:jelly>
]]></xml></sys_ui_macro></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_044132e6dc1815003a07b3fe8448a54a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Used by the Table variable demo ui macro.</description><name>SCVarTblAjax</name><script><![CDATA[var SCVarTblAjax = Class.create();

SCVarTblAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    
    ajaxFunction_getCIData: function(){
        var id = this.getParameter("sysparm_id");
        var rowNum = this.getParameter("sysparm_row");
        var ci = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci_server');
        var ciData = {};
        if (ci.get(id)) {
            ciData = {
                ci_os : ci.os.getDisplayValue() + '',
                ci_short_descr : ci.short_description + '',
                row : rowNum
            };
        }
        var answer = new JSON().encode(ciData);
		gs.log("SCVarTblAjax answer=" + answer);
        return answer;
    }
});]]></script><sys_created_by>snc-services_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2013-10-11 22:32:17</sys_created_on><sys_id>044132e6dc1815003a07b3fe8448a54a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>snc-services_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2014-08-18 16:56:58</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include><sys_app_file action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><customer_update>true</customer_update><publish_override/><replace_on_upgrade>false</replace_on_upgrade><restore/><sys_app/><sys_code>!!9|)/</sys_code><sys_created_by>snc-services_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2013-10-11 22:32:17</sys_created_on><sys_id>5391b6a6dc1815003a07b3fe8448a594</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SCVarTblAjax</sys_name><sys_parent/><sys_path>!!9|)/</sys_path><sys_policy/><sys_source_deleted>false</sys_source_deleted><sys_source_id>044132e6dc1815003a07b3fe8448a54a</sys_source_id><sys_source_table>sys_script_include</sys_source_table><sys_type>code</sys_type><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_044132e6dc1815003a07b3fe8448a54a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>snc-services_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2014-08-18 16:56:58</sys_updated_on></sys_app_file></record_update>
